description.p: Built with privacy at its core, Ulaa ensures that your data remains protected at every step, offering a browsing experience where security is non-negotiable.
Ulaa offers 5 unique modes—Personal, Work, Kids, Developer, and Open Season—designed to help you cut through the clutter, whether you’re working or unwinding.
Ulaa’s productivity tools including Smart Tab Grouping, Screen Capture, Notes, Zen View, and more make multitasking effortless.
You can also enable Ulaa Sync, powered by Zoho Accounts, to seamlessly take your data wherever you go.
Choose Ulaa and enjoy online privacy like never before.

ul.li: Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 145.0.7632.75.
[Desktop][UI] Updated copyright year to 2026 on the About page in Preferences.
[Desktop][UI] Fixed profile opening issue on the Welcome page.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 145.0.7632.45.
[Desktop][BugFix] Fixed a crash in Incognito mode triggered by copy-and-paste operations.
Chromium engine updated to 144.0.7559.134.
[Desktop][Enterprise][Experiment] Introduced a data masking policy for PII data.
[Desktop][BugFix] Fixed a crash during tab sharing when using non-English languages.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 144.0.7559.133.
[Desktop][BugFix] Added support for the --disable-features command-line flag.

Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 144.0.7559.97.

[Desktop][Experiment] Updated the phishing detection ML model to v25.7.1 for improved accuracy.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 143.0.7499.193.
[Desktop][UI] Added an option to enable or disable the Ulaa Notes icon in the toolbar.
[Desktop][UI] Introduced a search option in the profiles list.
[Desktop][BugFix] Updated embedded redirection URLs to use the .in top-level domain instead of .com.​
[Desktop] Added a status indicator and a reason showing whether “Offer to Save Password” is enforced.
[Desktop] Extended native messaging extension support to include Ulaa and Chrome paths at both system and user levels.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 143.0.7499.151.
[Desktop][BugFix] Fixed endless reload behavior on the About Page when Kids Mode is active.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 143.0.7499.110.
[Desktop][UI][Preferences] Implemented "Manage Security Keys" in the Preferences page.
[Linux][BugFix] Corrected the update instructions for Flatpak installation.

Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 142.0.7444.176.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Added Ulaa device ID to the enrollment configuration.

[Desktop][UI] Enhanced the Welcome Page for responsive display on all screen resolutions.
[Desktop][UI] Added options on the Extensions page to enable, disable, or remove the ad blocker, along with an option on the Preferences page to load it after removal.
[Desktop][Adblocker] Decoupled the ad blocker from the browser bundle and implemented fetching and loading during browser startup.
Updated to Chromium Version 141.0.7390.77.
[Desktop][BugFix] Resolved an issue causing the Widevine component download failure.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 141.0.7390.70.
[Desktop] Enhanced Safe Browsing file download handling with a user keep/discard option.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 141.0.7390.54.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 140.0.7339.208.

[Desktop][UI] Implemented an analytical view for Screen Sense.

[Desktop][Experimental][ZiaLab] Introduced AI/ML experimental feature section in the Preferences page.
[Desktop] Display the current state of a feature flag on `ulaa://flags` when set to Default.
